npc.smith.male.1.greeting.default: Hello %player%. Let's do our best again today!
npc.smith.male.1.talk.1: Nothing beats the clanging sound of a working forge.
npc.smith.male.1.talk.2: There are multiple different weapon types. You should try them all out to find the one that suits you the best.
npc.smith.male.1.talk.thunder: It is really pouring down huh?
npc.smith.male.1.follow.no: Hmm sorry but I can't right now.
npc.smith.male.1.dating.yes: I... didn't think that day would come but yes!
npc.smith.male.1.dating.no: Sorry but i don't feel that way
npc.smith.male.1.divorce.not: Huh? Why are you giving me that?
npc.generic.quest.mining.start:
You saw my request? Great!
You might have noticed various strange stones around the world. Those are minerals and they provide various different ores.
I want you to mine 10 of them for me.
npc.generic.quest.mining.active: To mine minerals you need atleast an iron pickaxe or a hammer. I want you to mine 10 mineral blocks for me.
npc.generic.quest.mining.end: Nice! Mining ores increases your mining level. With higher level you can get better ores from minerals. Here take this hammer, it should make mining minerals a bit easier.
npc.smith.male.1.dislike: Hmm you better get rid of your trash yourself next time.
npc.smith.male.1.like: You're giving this to me? Thanks! I will make good use of this
npc.smith.male.1.gift.default: Thank you for your gift. I really like ores
